meanings.sent1: She was toiling tirelessly in the garden under the hot sun.
meanings.sent2: The workers were toiling away to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent3: Despite toiling all day, she still had a smile on her face.
meanings.sent4: The ant was toiling non-stop to gather food for the winter.
meanings.sent5: The sound of toiling machines filled the factory with a sense of productivity.

meanings.definition: Engaged in hard and continuous work
meanings.sent1: The toiling farmer harvested the crops from dawn till dusk.
meanings.sent2: The toiling students were determined to succeed in their studies.
meanings.sent3: The toiling chef created a masterpiece in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The toiling bees buzzed around the hive, collecting nectar.
meanings.sent5: The toiling artist poured their heart into every brushstroke of the painting.

meanings.sent1: The toiling hiker climbed the steep mountain trail.
meanings.sent2: The toiling old car struggled to make it up the hill.
meanings.sent3: The toiling tortoise slowly made its way across the finish line.
meanings.sent4: The toiling river flowed through the rocky terrain.
meanings.sent5: The toiling wind pushed against the sails of the small boat.
